Event.Message: Encryption of volume %2 started.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Encryption of volume %2 stopped.

Event.Message: Encryption of volume %2 completed.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Decryption of volume %2 started.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Decryption of volume %2 stopped.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Decryption of volume %2 completed.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Conversion worker thread for volume %2 was started.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Conversion worker thread for volume %2 was temporarily stopped.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Auto-unlock enabled for volume %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error was encountered converting volume %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Auto-unlock disabled for volume %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The conversion operation on volume %2 encountered a bad sector error. Please validate the data on this volume.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to enable auto-unlock for volume %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to disable auto-unlock for volume %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Auto-unlocking failed for volume %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: An attempt to automatically restart conversion on volume %2 failed.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Metadata write: Volume %2 returning errors while trying to modify metadata. If failures continue, decrypt volume.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Metadata rebuild: An attempt to write a copy of metadata on volume %2 failed and may appear as disk corruption. If failures continue, decrypt volume.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Volume %2 contains bad clusters. These clusters will be skipped during conversion.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: No key file was found for Volume %2 during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: A corrupt key file was encountered for Volume %2 during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: No volume master key was retrieved in a key file during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The TPM was not enabled during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The SRK was found to be invalid during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The PCRs did not match during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: No volume master key was retrieved from a key file during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: A boot application hash did not match expected value during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The boot configuration options did not match expected values during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: No volume master key was retrieved from a PIN during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: No volume master key was retrieved from a recovery password during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid key was found during the last restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: An unexpected error was encountered attempting to retrieve the volume master key during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: A key was not available from required sources during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Metadata commit: Not all copies of metadata on volume %2 could be written. If failures continue, decrypt volume.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Metadata commit: No copies of metadata on volume %2 could be written. If failures continue, decrypt volume.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Metadata commit: Metadata update could not be flushed.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Metadata commit: An attempt to verify metadata update on volume %2 failed at read. If failures continue, decrypt volume.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Metadata commit: Update verification of metadata on volume %2 failed. If failures continue, decrypt volume.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Metadata initial read: Primary metadata record on volume %2 could not be found. Volume needs recovery.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Metadata initial read: Failover metadata record on volume %2 could not be found. Volume needs recovery.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Metadata initial read: Failover metadata record on volume %2 used. If failures continue, decrypt volume.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Metadata check: Metadata record on volume %2 could not be read and has been marked for rebuild. If failures continue, decrypt volume.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Metadata rebuild: An attempt build a new set of metadata on %2 failed at commit and may appear as disk corruption. If failures continue, decrypt volume.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Encrypted volume check: Volume information on %2 cannot be read.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Initial state check: Rolling volume conversion transaction on %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: BIOS/TCG Memory Overwrite Control: Error finding TPM driver.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: BIOS/TCG Memory Overwrite Control: Error registering TPM device interface.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: BIOS/TCG Memory Overwrite Control: Error changing value.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid BitLocker key was found during the last restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The auto-unlock master key was not available from the operating system volume. Retry the operation via the BitLocker WMI interface.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Boot debugging is enabled on Bootmgr so TPM based keys cannot be obtained.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The partition size specified in the partition table is smaller than the size of the file system contained by that partition. BitLocker TPM based keys cannot be used until the size of the partition calculated from the partition table is consistent with the size of the file system calculated from the bytes per sector and number of sectors fields in the boot sector.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: The system firmware failed to enable overwriting of system memory on restart. The firmware should be upgraded.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bootmgr failed to find a BitLocker key file for Volume %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bootmgr detected corruption in the BitLocker key file for Volume %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bootmgr failed to obtain the BitLocker volume master key from the key file contents.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bootmgr determined that the TPM is disabled.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bootmgr determined that the authorization data for the SRK of the TPM is incompatible with BitLocker.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bootmgr failed to obtain the BitLocker volume master key from the TPM because the PCRs did not match.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bootmgr failed to obtain the BitLocker volume master key from the TPM.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: A boot application hash did not match the expected value during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bootmgr failed to obtain the BitLocker volume master key from the TPM + PIN.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bootmgr failed to obtain the BitLocker volume master key from the recovery password.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: A valid BitLocker key was found during the last restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: An unexpected error was encountered attempting to retrieve the BitLocker volume master key during restart.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: An internal BitLocker self-test failed for drive %2. BitLocker cannot continue encrypting data. Contact your system administrator.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Bootmgr failed to obtain the BitLocker volume master key from the TPM + enhanced PIN.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="VolumeGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="OptionalGUID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: An internal BitLocker self-test failed for drive %2 when switching from raw mode to filtering mode. BitLocker cannot continue encrypting data on this drive. Contact your system administrator.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Volume" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="WritePhase" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>
